reviewText: This video is a little dated but has some great interviews with Billy Sheehan. Billy shows his musical knowledge by demonstrating diatonic scales up the neck and he emphasises the importance of being a solid BASS player first rather than a soloist. He also stresses the importance of playing cover material to get your chops and playing with a drummer to develop solid time and feel. A good video.
One of my absolute favorite bass instructional videos.  Lots of good information prented in a manner that's easy to understand.  Highly recommended for any bass player!

If your looking for a vid to teach you Mr Big songs this isn't it. What this vid does teach you is straight forward bass techniques. Left hand, right hand and some pretty interesting double hand techniques. Plus some  great bass playing by Billy. Bonus points for a 6 minute bass solo.
